product_name: Native Eyewear Pressley Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Style and sun protection go hand in hand with the women's Native Eyewear Pressley Polarized Sunglasses. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Stout Fade frames feature polarized brown lenses that are ideal for bright sunlight; brown tint enhances contrast and detail definition. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) (P.C.C.) lenses have a strong, hard coating to protect against scratching. P.C.C. lenses pass the rigorous ANSI Z80.3 tests for optical clarity and impact resistance and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Tough thermoplastic frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature; venting system enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Mastoid Temple Grip design ensures the temple ends hug behind your ears to securely keep sunglasses in place; Cam-Action Hinges(TM) quickly lock temples in position. 4-point Anti-Ocular Intrusion System(R) helps prevent lenses from shooting into your eyes in the event of high-velocity impact. The women's Native Eyewear Pressley Polarized Sunglasses are sized to best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: Style and sun protection go hand in hand with the women's Native Eyewear Pressley Polarized Sunglasses.
